data.eml:eml: Marthamea bayae, a new species of stonefly from Algeria (Plecoptera: Perlidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lamine, Smail, Lounaci, Abdelkader, Reding, Jean-Paul G., Vinçon, Gilles (2019): Marthamea bayae, a new species of stonefly from Algeria (Plecoptera: Perlidae). Zootaxa 4603 (2): 311-326, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4603.2.5
